trans-unit.source: Provides access to the cached data and customization information in a document or workbook that is part of a document-level customization created by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 提供对文档或工作簿（属于使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的文档级自定义项）中的缓存数据和自定义项信息的访问。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument> class to manage certain aspects of document-level customizations on a computer that does not have Excel or Word installed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument>类来管理未安装 Excel 的计算机上的文档级自定义项的某些方面或安装 Word。

trans-unit.source: You typically use this class in applications that do not integrate with Office, such as Console projects or Windows Forms projects, rather than Office projects.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，在集成的应用程序不与 Office，如控制台项目或 Windows 窗体项目，而不是 Office 项目中需要使用此类。

trans-unit.source: Use the following members of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument> class to perform common tasks:
trans-unit.target: 使用的以下成员<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument>类来执行常见任务：

trans-unit.source: To access and modify data in the data cache of a document on a server, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.CachedData%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问和修改数据的服务器上的文档数据缓存中，使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.CachedData%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To programmatically attach a customization to a document or remove a customization from a document, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.AddCustomization%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.RemoveCustomization%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要以编程方式将自定义项附加到文档或从文档中删除自定义项，使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.AddCustomization%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.RemoveCustomization%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To access or change the URL of the deployment manifest that is associated with the document, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.DeploymentManifestUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问或更改的部署清单的与文档相关联的 URL，请使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.DeploymentManifestUrl%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: There are two different versions of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument> class in the Visual Studio 2010 Tools for Office Runtime.
trans-unit.target: 有两个不同版本<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument>Visual Studio 2010 Tools for Office Runtime 中的类。

trans-unit.source: The version you should use depends on the target .NET Framework of the application in which you want to use the class:
trans-unit.target: 你应使用的版本取决于目标的应用程序的.NET Framework 中想要使用的类：

trans-unit.source: For applications that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument?displayProperty=fullName> class in the Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll assembly.
trans-unit.target: 为目标的应用程序[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument?displayProperty=fullName>Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll 程序集中的类。

trans-unit.source: For applications that target the .NET Framework 3.5, use the `Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument` class in the Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.v10.0.dll assembly.
trans-unit.target: 对于面向.NET Framework 3.5 的应用程序，使用`Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument`Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.v10.0.dll 程序集中的类。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Managing Documents on a Server by Using the ServerDocument Class](/visualstudio/vsto/managing-documents-on-a-server-by-using-the-serverdocument-class.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过在服务器上使用 ServerDocument 类管理文档](/visualstudio/vsto/managing-documents-on-a-server-by-using-the-serverdocument-class.md)。

trans-unit.source: Choosing Which Constructor to Use
trans-unit.target: 选择使用哪个构造函数

trans-unit.source: To use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument> class to access the cached data or the deployment manifest URL in a document, you must create a <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument>类来访问缓存的数据或部署清单 URL 在文档中，则必须创建<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument>对象。

trans-unit.source: There are two sets of <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument> constructors:
trans-unit.target: 有两组<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument>构造函数：

trans-unit.source: A set that you can use to access a document that has already been opened in memory.
trans-unit.target: 一组可以用来访问已在内存中打开的文档。

trans-unit.source: A set that you can use to access a document that is on disk.
trans-unit.target: 一组可以用来访问磁盘上的文档。

trans-unit.source: Accessing a Document in Memory
trans-unit.target: 访问内存中的文档

trans-unit.source: To access a document that has already been opened in memory, use one of the following constructors:
trans-unit.target: 若要访问已在内存中打开的文档，请使用以下构造函数之一：

trans-unit.source: These constructors accept a byte array or a <xref:System.IO.Stream> that represents the document in memory.
trans-unit.target: 这些构造函数接受字节数组或<xref:System.IO.Stream>表示内存中的文档。

trans-unit.source: This is useful if you want to modify the cached data or application manifest in the document before streaming it to a destination by using the HTTP protocol.
trans-unit.target: 这是很有用，如果你想要修改的缓存的数据或应用程序清单中之前流的形式传送到目标通过使用 HTTP 协议文档。

trans-unit.source: To use these constructors, the document must already have a customization; otherwise, these constructors will throw a <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.CannotLoadManifestException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用这些构造函数，该文档必须已经自定义项;否则，这些构造函数会引发<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.CannotLoadManifestException>异常。

trans-unit.source: Accessing a Document on Disk
trans-unit.target: 访问磁盘上的文档

trans-unit.source: To access a document that is on disk, use one of the following constructors:
trans-unit.target: 若要访问磁盘上的文档，请使用以下构造函数之一：

trans-unit.source: These constructors accept the full path of the document that you want to open.
trans-unit.target: 这些构造函数接受你想要打开的文档的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: By default, the document is opened with read/write access.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，打开该文档时具有读/写访问权限。

trans-unit.source: If you want to open the document with read-only or write-only access, use the constructor that has a <xref:System.IO.FileAccess> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要以只读或只写访问权限打开文档，使用构造函数具有<xref:System.IO.FileAccess>参数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument> that loads a specified document and then displays the URL of the deployment manifest for the customization that is attached to the document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个新<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument>，加载指定的文档，然后显示的部署清单的附加到文档的自定义项的 URL。

trans-unit.target: 控制台应用程序项目或某些其他非 Office 项目。

trans-unit.target: Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll 和 Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dll (如果项目面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)])。

trans-unit.target: 使用要加载的文档的完整路径，初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to access the cached data or deployment manifest information in a document that is on disk.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来访问磁盘上的文档中的缓存的数据或部署清单信息。

trans-unit.source: When you use this constructor, the specified document is opened with read/write access.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用此构造函数时，具有读/写访问权限打开指定的文档。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="documentPath" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" /> 或为空，或者完全由空白字符组成。

trans-unit.source: The file specified by <paramref name="documentPath" /> does not exist.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="documentPath" /> 指定的文件不存在。

trans-unit.source: The file specified by <paramref name="documentPath" /> has a customization that was not created with the Visual Studio 2010 Tools for Office Runtime or the Visual Studio Tools for the Microsoft Office system (version 3.0 Runtime).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="documentPath" /> 指定的文件具有并非通过 Visual Studio 2010 Tools for Office Runtime 或 Visual Studio Tools for Microsoft Office System（3.0 版 Runtime）创建的自定义。

trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] 不支持 <paramref name="documentPath" /> 指定的文件的文件扩展名。

trans-unit.source: A byte array that represents the document to be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示要加载的文档的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: The file name extension of the document that is stored in the <c>bytes</c> parameter, preceded by a period (.)—for example, ".xlsx" or ".docx".
trans-unit.target: 文档的文件扩展名，存储在 <c>bytes</c> 参数中，前面有一个句点 (.)，例如“.xlsx”或“.docx”。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument" /> class using a byte array that represents the document to be loaded and the file name extension of the document.
trans-unit.target: 使用表示要加载的文档的字节数组和该文档的文件扩展名，初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to access the cached data or deployment manifest information in a document that is already in memory.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数可以访问的文档中，已在内存中缓存的数据或部署清单信息。

trans-unit.source: When you use this constructor, the document is opened with read/write access.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用此构造函数时，则打开该文档时具有读/写访问权限。

trans-unit.source: The `fileType` parameter is used only to determine the type of document that is stored in the byte array.
trans-unit.target: `fileType`参数仅用于确定存储的字节数组中的文档的类型。

trans-unit.source: The value of `fileType` is mapped to one of the file types that are supported for document-level customizations.
trans-unit.target: 值`fileType`映射到一个对于文档级自定义支持的文件类型。

trans-unit.source: No attempt is made to open the file.
trans-unit.target: 未尝试打开文件。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally pass in a complete file name (for example, "Workbook1.xlsx"), but if you do this, only the file name extension is used.
trans-unit.target: 你可选择传入完整文件名 (例如，"Workbook1.xlsx")，但如果这样做，则使用文件扩展名。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the supported file types, see [Architecture of Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/architecture-of-document-level-customizations.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关支持的文件类型的详细信息，请参阅[体系结构的文档级自定义](/visualstudio/vsto/architecture-of-document-level-customizations.md)。

trans-unit.target: 若要在调用此构造函数后访问该文档的字节数组，使用 [ServerDocument 构造函数 (字节\<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.Document%2A > 属性。

trans-unit.source: When you publish an Office solution, the assembly that is copied to the publish folder has the .deploy file name extension.
trans-unit.target: 当发布 Office 解决方案时，复制到发布文件夹的程序集具有.deploy 文件扩展名。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the assembly name is WordDocument1.dll, the file name of the assembly in the publish folder is WordDocument1.dll.deploy.

trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedData" /> 对象，表示文档中包含的缓存数据。

trans-unit.source: The cached data that is contained in the document.
trans-unit.target: 文档中包含的缓存数据。

trans-unit.source: The cached data in a document is stored in a hierarchy of objects.
trans-unit.target: 在文档中缓存的数据存储在对象的层次结构。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedData> object returned by this property is the first object in that hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedData>该层次结构中的第一个对象是此属性返回的对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Accessing Data in Documents on the Server](/visualstudio/vsto/accessing-data-in-documents-on-the-server.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[访问的服务器上的文档数据](/visualstudio/vsto/accessing-data-in-documents-on-the-server.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the deployment manifest for the customization that is associated with the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与文档关联的自定义项的部署清单 URL。

trans-unit.source: A URL that specifies the name and location of the deployment manifest for the customization that is associated with the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 URL，指定与文档关联的自定义项的部署清单的名称和位置。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to a new URL if you move the deployment manifest for a customization to a different location, and you want the document to locate customization updates from the new location.
trans-unit.target: 如果将的部署清单的自定义项移动到另一个位置，并且你想要查找从新位置的自定义更新的文档，请将此属性设置为新的 URL。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property, the URL must point to a deployment manifest for the customization that is already associated with the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置此属性，该 URL 必须指向已与文档相关联的自定义部署清单。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this property to associate a new customization with a document.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能用于将新的自定义与文档相关联。

trans-unit.source: To add a customization to an uncustomized document, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.AddCustomization%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要将自定义项添加到自定义的文档，使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.AddCustomization%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To add a different customization to a customized document, first use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.RemoveCustomization%2A> method to remove the current customization, and then use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.AddCustomization%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要将不同的自定义项添加到自定义文档中，先使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.RemoveCustomization%2A>方法来删除当前自定义项，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.AddCustomization%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Getting the URL in Applications that Target the .NET Framework 3.5
trans-unit.target: 在面向.NET Framework 3.5 的应用程序中获取 URL

trans-unit.source: When you use the `ServerDocument` class in the Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.v10.0.dll assembly in an application that targets the .NET Framework 3.5, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.DeploymentManifestUrl%2A> property returns the current deployment manifest URL only if the documentation-level customization is installed on the computer where you are running the application.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用`ServerDocument`在面向.NET Framework 3.5 的应用程序中的 Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.v10.0.dll 程序集的类<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.DeploymentManifestUrl%2A>属性返回当前部署清单的 URL 仅如果在其中运行该应用程序的计算机上安装了文档级自定义项。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 对于其他类型的单元格，此属性返回 `null`。

trans-unit.source: If you need to get the deployment manifest URL of a document-level customization that is not installed on the computer where you are running the application (for example, on a server where a document-level customization is published), target the .NET Framework 4 in the application, reference the Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll assembly, and use the `ServerDocument` class in that assembly.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要获取其中你运行应用程序 （例如，在其中发布的文档级自定义项的服务器） 的计算机未安装的文档级自定义项的部署清单 URL，请在.NET Framework 4 为目标应用程序中，引用 Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll 程序集，并使用`ServerDocument`该程序集中的类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.%23ctor%28System.String%29> constructor to create a new <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument> that loads a specified document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.%23ctor%28System.String%29>构造函数来创建一个新<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument>加载指定的文档。

trans-unit.source: The example then displays the URL of the deployment manifest for the customization that is attached to the document.
trans-unit.target: 然后，此示例显示的部署清单的附加到文档的自定义项的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Gets the byte array of an in-memory document that is loaded into the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取加载到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument" /> 中的内存中文档的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: The byte array of an in-memory document that is loaded into the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: 加载到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument" /> 中的内存中文档的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: This property returns a filled byte array if the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument> was created by using the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.%23ctor%28System.Byte%5B%5D%2CSystem.String%29> constructor that has a byte array parameter, or the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.%23ctor%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.String%29> constructor that has a <xref:System.IO.Stream> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回已填充的字节数组，如果<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument>已通过使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.%23ctor%28System.Byte%5B%5D%2CSystem.String%29>具有一个字节数组参数的构造函数或<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.%23ctor%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.String%29>构造函数具有<xref:System.IO.Stream>参数。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this property returns an empty byte array.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此属性返回一个空字节数组。

trans-unit.source: Using this property enables you to make changes to a document and send it to a client without writing the document to disk.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性，可对文档进行更改并将其发送到客户端，而无需编写到磁盘的文档。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.%23ctor%28System.Byte%5B%5D%2CSystem.String%29> constructor to create a new <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument> from a byte array that contains an Excel workbook with the .xlsx file name extension.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.%23ctor%28System.Byte%5B%5D%2CSystem.String%29>构造函数来创建一个新<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument>从字节数组，其中包含扩展名.xlsx 的 Excel 工作簿。

trans-unit.source: The example then uses the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.Document%2A> property to display the number of bytes in the document.
trans-unit.target: 然后该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.Document%2A>属性显示在文档中的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the version of the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] that was used to create the customization that is associated with the specified document.
trans-unit.target: 返回用于创建与指定文档相关联的自定义项的 [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] 的版本。

trans-unit.source: A number that specifies the version of the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] that was used to create the associated customization.
trans-unit.target: 一个编号，指定用于创建关联的自定义项的 [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)] 版本。

trans-unit.source: Office solutions created in different versions of Visual Studio use different versions of the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在不同版本的 Visual Studio 中创建的 office 解决方案使用不同版本的[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Each version of the runtime provides a different version of the `ServerDocument` class that is designed to work with solutions for that version of the runtime.
trans-unit.target: 每个版本的运行时提供的不同版本`ServerDocument`用于处理该版本的运行时的解决方案的类。

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument> class can be used with solutions that are created by using [!INCLUDE[vs_dev12](~/includes/vs-dev12-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] and with 2007 Microsoft Office solutions that are created by using Visual Studio 2008.
trans-unit.target: 此版本的<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument>类可以用于通过创建的解决方案[!INCLUDE[vs_dev12](~/includes/vs-dev12-md.md)]，[!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)]和使用 2007 Microsoft Office 解决方案中，使用 Visual Studio 2008 创建的。

trans-unit.source: The following table specifies the meaning of the return values for this method.
trans-unit.target: 下表指定此方法的返回值的含义。

trans-unit.source: Return value
trans-unit.target: 返回值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The document does not have a customization.
trans-unit.target: 文档不具有自定义项。

trans-unit.source: The document has a customization that was created by using Visual Studio Tools for Office, Version 2003.
trans-unit.target: 文档具有使用 Visual Studio Tools for Office 2003 版创建的自定义项。

trans-unit.source: The document has a customization that was created by using the Visual Studio 2005 Tools for Office Second Edition runtime.
trans-unit.target: 文档具有已通过使用 Visual Studio 2005 Tools for Office Second Edition runtime 的自定义项。

trans-unit.source: This is the version of the runtime that is used by customizations for Microsoft Office 2003 in Visual Studio 2005 Tools for Office and Visual Studio 2008.
trans-unit.target: 这是用于通过自定义操作在 Visual Studio 2005 Tools 中的 Microsoft Office 2003 Office 和 Visual Studio 2008 的运行时版本。

trans-unit.source: The document has a customization that was created by using the Visual Studio 2010 Tools for Office Runtime or the Visual Studio Tools for the Microsoft Office system (version 3.0 Runtime).
trans-unit.target: 该文档具有的自定义项已通过使用 Visual Studio 2010 Tools Office 运行时或 Visual Studio Tools for Microsoft Office system (3.0 版运行时)。

trans-unit.source: Version 3.0 of the runtime is used by customizations for the 2007 Microsoft Office system in Visual Studio 2008.
trans-unit.target: 自定义 2007 Microsoft Office 系统在 Visual Studio 2008 使用的运行时版本 3.0。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different versions of the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)], see [Visual Studio Tools for Office Runtime Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/visual-studio-tools-for-office-runtime-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关不同版本的详细信息[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]，请参阅[Visual Studio Tools for Office Runtime 概述](/visualstudio/vsto/visual-studio-tools-for-office-runtime-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: This method throws an exception if the specified document has a customization that was not created with the Visual Studio 2010 Tools for Office Runtime or the Visual Studio Tools for the Microsoft Office system (version 3.0 Runtime).
trans-unit.target: 此方法将引发异常，如果指定的文档的自定义的项不是创建与 Visual Studio 2010 Tools Office 运行时或 Visual Studio Tools for Microsoft Office system (3.0 版运行时)。

trans-unit.source: For example, this method throws an exception if you specify a document that was created by using a project template for Microsoft Office 2003 in Visual Studio 2008, because these project templates use the Visual Studio 2005 Tools for Office Second Edition runtime.
trans-unit.target: 例如，此方法将引发异常，如果指定被使用在 Visual Studio 2008 中，Microsoft Office 2003 项目模板创建，因为这些项目模板 for Office Second Edition runtime 中使用 Visual Studio 2005 Tools 的文档。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a document has a customization that was created by using any version of Visual Studio, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.GetCustomizationVersion%2A> method instead of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.IsCustomized%2A> method.

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.GetCustomizationVersion%2A> returns 0 (zero) if the document does not have a customization.
